img_above_text:
![Wukong UpperHollow 6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9c/Wukong_UpperHollow_6.jpg)
As you head through the gate, look on the other side for a small **Turtle Chest** , and inside you'll find a **Goji Shoots Soak** for your Gourd!
img_below_text:
Beyond the wall, you can find a thin ledge leading along the rocky cave wall guarded by a Dragonfly Guai peppering you with poison arrows. After you cross the gap, you can spot torches up the wall on the right, and a lower path to the left leading back down to an overlook for the Upper Hollow Shrine, complete with a green Wisp to absorb along the ledge.
![Wukong UpperHollow 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8f/Wukong_UpperHollow_8.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 8 from the file 'Webbed_Hollow_-_Upper_Hollow_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong UpperHollow 6.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/9/9c/Wukong_UpperHollow_6.jpg)
As you head through the gate, look on the other side for a small **Turtle Chest** , and inside you'll find a **Goji Shoots Soak** for your Gourd!"
            - Following Text: "Beyond the wall, you can find a thin ledge leading along the rocky cave wall guarded by a Dragonfly Guai peppering you with poison arrows. After you cross the gap, you can spot torches up the wall on the right, and a lower path to the left leading back down to an overlook for the Upper Hollow Shrine, complete with a green Wisp to absorb along the ledge.
![Wukong UpperHollow 8.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/8/8f/Wukong_UpperHollow_8.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing the protagonist standing in a dimly lit cave environment. The character is positioned near a wooden bridge, with a torch providing some illumination. The preceding text suggests the player has just passed through a gate and found a Turtle Chest containing a Goji Shoots Soak. The following text indicates the player will soon encounter a Dragonfly Guai enemy on a thin ledge, with paths leading to an overlook and a green Wisp. The image serves to illustrate the journey through the Upper Hollow area, highlighting the atmospheric setting and the player's progression through the cave.
